name: Default Form Status
description: Set a default or hide form status on instruments

authors.name: Adam Nunez
authors.institution: UW Madison - Center for Tobacco Research and Intervention

project-settings.name:
To set an instrument's default form status go to the instrument's design page.
Note: Unlike other instrument-based settings, default form status will be lost when an instrument is renamed.

Click here to view all saved configuration.
